action.comment: Protection gradient in the corner of the image, for the action on alert messages.

browse.comment: üì∫ CTV Background with bottom glow, used primarily on content pages.

utility.comment: üì∫ CTV Background with top glow, used primarily on utility pages like settings.

browse.comment: Background with bottom glow, used primarily on content pages.

utility.comment: Background with top glow, used primarily on utility pages like settings.

scroll.comment: Protection gradient above the Floating Sticky Button group

high.comment: Used for the selected and/or focus state of some cards, including plan cards, add-ons, and billing cycle cards.

low.comment: Used for the selected (not focus) state of some cards, including plan cards, add-ons, and billing cycle cards.

ctv.comment: Primary Channel Hub protection layer gradient used beneath the channel rail and above the video playing.
Gradient background on CDP for CTV.  Used for landing and tab view.

surface.comment: Used for the surface in the Dialog component.

fade-out.comment: Place after the main area of a full-width component to create a "fade-out" transition into the app background.

ctv.comment: Layered protection gradient for Header, used for CTV

landscape.comment: Layered protection gradient for Header, used for landscape viewports

portrait.comment: Layered protection gradient for Header, used for portrait viewports

bottom.comment: Placed at the base of the Immersive Hero to create a smooth fade-to-black transition between the component image and the app background.

bottom-ctv.comment: Used in the CTV Immersive Hero scroll state, to create a smooth fade-to-black transition between the component image and the app background.

ctv.comment: Primary gradient for CTV Immersive Hero. Creates appropriate contrast layer between Info-block and artwork/video layer.

ctv-fallback.comment: CTV Fallback token used to create additional contrast in the Immersive Hero for platforms that can‚Äôt support text-shadow on info-block. Used in addition to the Primary gradient.

landscape.comment: Primary gradient for WeMo Landscape Immersive Hero. Gradient provides protection and contrast for InfoBlockShort, Nav, and Audio CTA icon.

portrait.comment: Primary gradient for Portrait Immersive Hero. Provides protection and contrast for InfoBlockShort, Nav & Audio CTA icon, and creates a fade-to-black transition.

landscape.comment: Protection gradient for landscape view of Inline Hero for CTV & WeMo. Gradient provides protection and contrast for InfoBlockShort displayed over artwork.

portrait.comment: Protection gradient for portrait view of Inline Hero. Gradient provides protection and contrast for InfoBlockShort displayed over artwork.

ctv.comment: CTV navigation protection gradient used to separate the navigation menu from the underlying page when expanded.

ctv-collapsed-fallback.comment: CTV Roku navigation protection gradient for the collapsed state to be used on browse pages that include horizontal scrolling (in lieu of tile overflow state)

wemo.comment: Navigation menu protection gradient for web and mobile. Displayed when the navigation menu is expanded to separate the menu from the underlying page.

mobile.comment: Top app bar protection gradient for mobile apps. Displayed when in an un-scrolled state.

base.comment: Used for the right arrow pagination hover gradient to provide contrast with the background; default state

hover.comment: Used for the right arrow pagination hover gradient to provide contrast with the background; arrow hover state

base.comment: Used for left arrow pagination gradient to provide contrast with the background; default state

hover.comment: Used for the left arrow pagination hover gradient to provide contrast with the background; arrow hover state

overlay.comment: Gradient needs to overlay over video as well as Up Next and End Cards.

overlay-ctv.comment: Gradient for CTV to overlay over video as well as Up Next and End Cards.

bottom.comment: gradient protection layer used on the bottom of the preview rail

side.comment: gradient protection layer used on the side of the preview rail

consumer-messaging.comment: Used for the scrim in the full screen message component for consumer messaging.

ctv.comment: Used on the Showcase Hero, on CTV. Creates appropriate contrast for the info-block when placed on top of an artwork/video layer.

ctv-fallback.comment: Fallback Gradient for CTV Showcase Hero. Creates the appropriate contrast layer between info-block and artwork/video layer when there‚Äôs no drop shadow on info block text.

medium.comment: Used on the Showcase Hero, on breakpoints BP-03+. Creates appropriate contrast for the info-block when placed on top of an artwork/video layer, particularly useful if the info block text has no dropshadow.

small.comment: Used on the Showcase Hero, on smaller breakpoints (BP 01-02). Creates appropriate contrast for the info-block when placed on top of an artwork/video layer.

tile.comment: Used on the Showcase Tile to create contrast between Logo and Artwork.

action.comment: (WeMo) Used as protection gradient for the Action icons (Play, Now Playing) in Tiles to provide contrast with the key art. Used when a progress bar is present.

action-ctv.comment: (CTV) Used as protection gradient for the Action icons (Play, Now Playing) in Tiles to provide contrast with the key art.

action-indicator.comment: Used as protection gradient for the Action icons (Play, Now Playing) in Tiles to provide contrast with the key art. Used when a progress bar is not present.

base.comment: Used as default protection gradient for the Action Menu (Kebab) in Tiles to provide contrast with the key art.

hover.comment: On hover, used as protection gradient for the Action Menu (Kebab) in Tiles to provide contrast with the key art.
